1.name: From Here to Eternity
1.description: In Hawaii in 1941, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing on his unit's team, while his captain's wife and second-in-command are falling in love.

2.name: Shane
2.description: A weary gunfighter attempts to settle down with a homestead family, but a smoldering settler/rancher conflict forces him to act.

3.name: Roman Holiday
3.description: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

4.name: Peter Pan
4.description: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

5.name: Julius Caesar
5.description: The growing ambition of Julius Caesar is a source of major concern to his close friend Brutus. Cassius persuades him to participate in his plot to assassinate Caesar, but they have both sorely underestimated Mark Antony.

6.name: The Robe
6.description: In the Roman province of Judea during the 1st century, Roman tribune Marcellus Gallio is ordered to crucify Jesus of Nazareth but is tormented by his guilty conscience afterwards.

7.name: Stazione Termini
7.description: Prior to leaving by train for Paris, a married American woman tries to break off her affair with a young Italian in Rome's Stazione Termini.

8.name: Column South
8.description: Before the Civil War, Lt. Jed Sayre's efforts to conciliate the cavalry and the Navajo are undermined by his racist C.O. and Confederate sympathizers.

9.name: The War of the Worlds
9.description: A small town in California is attacked by Martians, beginning a worldwide invasion.

10.name: Hondo
10.description: Army dispatch rider Hondo Lane discovers a woman and young son living in the midst of warring Apaches and becomes their protector.

11.name: Stalag 17
11.description: When two escaping American World War II prisoners are killed, the German P.O.W. camp barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

12.name: Tôkyô monogatari
12.description: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

13.name: The Big Heat
13.description: Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.

14.name: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
14.description: Showgirls Lorelei Lee and Dorothy Shaw travel to Paris, pursued by a private detective hired by the suspicious father of Lorelei's fiancé, as well as a rich, enamored old man and many other doting admirers.

15.name: Le salaire de la peur
15.description: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

16.name: House of Wax
16.description: An associate burns down a wax museum with the owner inside, but he survives only to become vengeful and murderous.

17.name: The Wild One
17.description: Two rival motorcycle gangs terrorize a small town after one of their leaders is thrown in jail.

18.name: How to Marry a Millionaire
18.description: Three women set out to find eligible millionaires to marry, but find true love in the process.

19.name: Will Any Gentleman...?
19.description: About a henpecked bank clerk who lives a dreary existence in suburban London. After a mix-up at a music hall, he finds himself onstage with ambiguously foreign magician Mendoza, who hypnotizes him into losing all of his inhibitions.

20.name: Niagara
20.description: As two couples are visiting Niagara Falls, tensions between one wife and her husband reach the level of murder.

21.name: Titanic
21.description: An unhappily married couple struggle to deal with their problems while on board the ill-fated ship.

22.name: Sommaren med Monika
22.description: A pair of teenagers meet one summer day, start a reckless affair and abandon their families to be with one another.

23.name: Fear and Desire
23.description: Four soldiers trapped behind enemy lines must confront their fears and desires.

24.name: Sea Devils
24.description: Gilliat,a fisherman/smuggler is in jail, and is offered a pardon, if he undertakes a mission to sail to France to rescue Douchette, an English agent, whose cover has been blown,and who has now been jailed. Gilliat accepts the challenge.

25.name: I vitelloni
25.description: A character study of five young men at crucial turning points in their lives in a small town in Italy.

26.name: It Came from Outer Space
26.description: A spaceship from another world crashes in the Arizona desert and only an amateur stargazer and a schoolteacher suspect alien influence when the local townsfolk begin to act strangely.

27.name: Invaders from Mars
27.description: A young boy learns that space aliens are taking over the minds of earthlings.

28.name: The Long Memory
28.description: Released from prison after twelve years, a wrongfully convicted British man seeks revenge on the witnesses who lied at his trial.

29.name: Thunder Over the Plains
29.description: In Post-Bellum Texas, an army captain tries to keep the peace between overtaxed, impoverished farmers and greedy carpetbaggers.

30.name: Laxdale Hall
30.description: A parliamentary delegation is sent to a remote community in the Scottish Highlands where the residents are protesting at their poor links with the outside world. After a few days amongst ...                See full summary »

31.name: The Redhead from Wyoming
31.description: In Wyoming, Sweetwater town sheriff Stan Blaine finds himself in the middle of a range war between greedy cattle barons and newcomer settlers who compete for public lands and unbranded stray cattle.

32.name: Calamity Jane
32.description: The story of Calamity Jane, her saloon, and her romance with Wild Bill Hickok.

33.name: Ugetsu monogatari
33.description: A tale of ambition, family, love, and war set in the midst of the Japanese Civil Wars of the sixteenth century.

34.name: I Confess
34.description: A priest, who comes under suspicion for murder, cannot clear his name without breaking the seal of the confessional.

35.name: Glen or Glenda
35.description: A psychiatrist tells the stories of a transvestite (Glen or Glenda) and a pseudohermaphrodite (Alan or Anne).

36.name: The Beast from 20,000 Fathoms
36.description: A ferocious dinosaur awakened by an Arctic atomic test terrorizes the North Atlantic and, ultimately, New York City.

37.name: Jigokumon
37.description: A samurai pursues a married lady-in-waiting.

38.name: Pickup on South Street
38.description: A pickpocket unwittingly lifts a message destined for enemy agents and becomes a target for a Communist spy ring.

39.name: South of Algiers
39.description: A British Museum archaeologist is searching for an ancient golden mask buried in a Roman tomb in Algeria but tomb robbers follow the academic in the hope of stealing the precious relic.

40.name: The Juggler
40.description: In 1949, former concentration camp inmate and Berlin native Hans Muller, immigrates to Israel where, due to psychological problems, he can't adjust to peacetime life.

41.name: The Man Behind the Gun
41.description: An undercover government agent battles insurrectionists whose want Southern California to secede and become a slave state.

42.name: Les vacances de Monsieur Hulot
42.description: Monsieur Hulot comes to a beachside hotel for a vacation and accidentally, but good-naturedly, causes havoc.

43.name: Beat the Devil
43.description: On their way to Africa are a group of rogues who hope to get rich there, and a seemingly innocent British couple. They meet and things happen...

44.name: Kiss Me Kate
44.description: An ex-husband and wife team star in a musical version of 'The Taming of the Shrew'; off-stage, the production is troublesome with ex-lovers' quarrels and a gangster looking for some money owed to them.

45.name: Mogambo
45.description: On a Kenyan safari, white hunter Victor Marswell has a love triangle with seductive American socialite Eloise Kelly and anthropologist Donald Nordley's cheating wife Linda.

46.name: The Band Wagon
46.description: A pretentiously artistic director is hired for a new Broadway musical and changes it beyond recognition.

47.name: Lili
47.description: An orphaned young woman becomes part of a puppet act and forms a relationship with the anti-social puppeteer.

48.name: Mesa of Lost Women
48.description: A mad scientist named Arana is creating giant spiders and dwarfs in his lab on Zarpa Mesa in Mexico. He wants to create a master race of superwomen by injecting his female subjects with spider venom.

49.name: The Hitch-Hiker
49.description: Two fishermen pick up a psychotic escaped convict who tells them that he intends to murder them when the ride is over.

50.name: The Story of Three Loves
50.description: An anthology film consisting of three very different stories about love set in Europe and told in flashback.
